mdRecord.dcterms:title: War time correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stiggleman from I. H. Slusher
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, July 5, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stiggleman at Mannassas Junction, Prince Wm Co, Va from I. H. Slusher at Culpepper CH, Va. 1 original piece and 1 original envelope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
